T02D2075:158a-1: aa lu ka n'a ma s'a dha ni /
T02D2075:158a-3: aa lu ka zhes bya ba'i sgrub thabs /
T02D2075:158a-4: aom aa lu ke be lu ke grihna pi na dam pi sh'a tsa ni sv'a h'a /
T02D2075:158a-5: bsnyen pa 'bum phrag gcig bzlas la /
T02D2075:158a-6: de nas sgrub pa brtsam par byas te rang zan
T02D2075:158a-7: za ba'i phud la sngags lan bdun bzlas te rgyab
T02D2075:158a-8: tu bor na / zhag bdun nas rang gi rna bar gtam gshod [*gshong?] du 'ong ngo //
T02D2075:158a-9: gal te sgrub pa dang po la ma byung na yi chad par mi bya ste /
T02D2075:158a-10: sgrub pa gnyis la bram ze bsad kyang grub par 'gyur ba la the tshom med do //
T02D2075:158a-11: de ma yin na dpal rdo rje 'chang gi bka' bcag pas mgo gas sam 'chi bar 'gyur ro //
